interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/10/15
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Edgar Wright'], 'Producers': ['Nira Park'], 'Starring': ['Simon Pegg', 'Nick Frost', 'Paddy Considine'], 'Studio': ['NBC Universal']}
Review Text: As much as I love Simon Pegg, I didn't like his character in this movie. I just couldn't understand why he had to stick with his agenda that badly. It made me somewhat uncomfortable and lost me in the middle of the movie.
Review Title: Wasn't crazy about this
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

actual_interaction.title: Wasn't crazy about this
actual_interaction.text: As much as I love Simon Pegg, I didn't like his character in this movie. I just couldn't understand why he had to stick with his agenda that badly. It made me somewhat uncomfortable and lost me in the middle of the movie.
